post:
Howdy guys,

We at MyW deliver reliable Shared and Reseller Hosting for our customers with the following setup:

SSD Arrays
DDoS Protection
DirectAdmin
MailChannels for Outbound Delivery
LiteSpeed
LSCache
Let's Encrypt
CloudLinux
Softaculous
Daily backups (although, JetBackup isn't compatible with DirectAdmin yet, so these are the regular daily, compressed backups).
Worried about migrations? No worries, we will migrate your account(s) for our servers.
cPanel to DirectAdmin, or DirectAdmin to DirectAdmin. We got you covered.

Server location: Falkenstein, Germany, EU (Hetzner)
Server specifications:
E3 1246 v3
32GB RAM
4x1TB SSD @ RAID 5

- Promotions - 

Shared Hosting plan:

Basic 
25GB SSD 
Unlimited Emails, FTP Accounts, Domains, etc.
2.50€ per month, plus VAT if applicable - [ORDER](https://myw.pt/manager/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)
Coupon code: 50OFF

Pro 
50GB SSD 
Unlimited Emails, FTP Accounts, Domains, etc.
5€ per month, plus VAT if applicable - [ORDER](https://myw.pt/manager/cart.php?a=add&pid=9)
Coupon code: 50OFF

Reseller Hosting plan:

Entry
50GB SSD
Unlimited Accounts
5€ per month, plus VAT if applicable - [ORDER](https://myw.pt/manager/cart.php?a=add&pid=6)
Coupon code: 50OFF

200% CPU

Should you guys have any further questions please let us know!
